Articles.Content:
Hello there!

My name is Volcanix, or better my real name is Johannes, and I come from Frankfurt, Germany (don't judge my english skills ).

After some problems with the registration process which kept telling me that I'm a spammer i finally managed to register here .

However, I play KSP on my Early 2014 MacBook Air, which is a lot better for gaming than I expected, and I've got a whole lot of fun playing it. Currently I'm playing on career mode and working on getting science points and planning my flight to the Mun. Has somebody tips for me? I'm also thinking about founding a KSP "company" and completing missions and so on like some other people.. *searching lÃƒÂ© link* - nah, too lazy. Has somebody an idea for a name? Would be great.

Oh and I've got another question, how do you set an avatar in this forum? I googled it and most things were outdated or simply didn't work. So, yeah.

I think I'll just go on and "explore" this forum to get more knowledge about that awesome game. See you!

Welcome to the forums!

No ideas for a company name. I've only had one good idea and I'm keeping it.

This post will show you where to add your avatar Ã¢â‚¬â€œ first click on My Profile in the top right corner.

Biggest help for me for getting to the Mun was the tutorial missions in the game, but there are many good tutorials in this forum.

Oh thank you so much I'm pretty sure that I've already read that and the "Edit profile picture" thing isn't visible for me, but I think I'll figure it out. Thanks!

EDIT: Just read through The complete FAQ, no I know it: During The first 3 Posts you are in The Curious George group and cant do things like that

Edited July 30, 2014 by Volcanix
figured it out
